name: stdbuf
shortDescription: Run COMMAND, with modified buffering operations for its standard streams.
longDescription: Run COMMAND, with modified buffering operations for its standard streams.

options.name: input
options.description: Adjust the standard input stream buffering.

options.name: output
options.description: Adjust the standard output stream buffering.

options.name: error
options.description: Adjust the standard error stream buffering.
